title: Data Analysis Python PySpark
author: Jonathan Rioux
description: Written by renowned data science experts, this book provides a comprehensive introduction to the principles and techniques of data science in the business context. It covers topics such as data analysis, machine learning, and data visualization, with a focus on applying these techniques to solve real-world business problems.

title: Learn to Write DAX
author: Matt Allington
description: This book is a practical guide to data manipulation and analysis using the Python programming language. It covers topics such as data cleaning, data transformation, and data visualization using popular libraries like pandas and matplotlib. Whether you are a beginner or an experienced data scientist, this book will help you master the essentials of data analysis with Python.

title: Architecting Google Cloud Solutions
author: Victor Dantas
description: This authoritative guide provides a comprehensive overview of data warehousing concepts and best practices. Whether you are designing a new data warehouse or maintaining an existing one, this book is an essential resource for data management professionals.
